name: Low Landing! B-17G Flying Fortress [N5017N] Arriving at Springbank Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
The Experimental Aircraft Association, or EAA, brought their Boeing B-17G Flying Fortress to Calgary's Springbank Airport a couple weeks ago, where it flew a number of short flights around the area for some lucky passengers for the low price of $700 Canadian. On its last day, it did one more passenger flight, and here it is arriving, making a nice bank onto the approach for runway 35. Enjoy!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Experimental Aircraft Association (EAA)
Aircraft: Boeing B-17G Flying Fortress
Aircraft Name: Aluminum Overcast
Livery: WW2 USAF
Engines: 4x Wright Aeronautical Corp. Cyclone 9
Registration: N5017N
Route: YBW-YQR
Callsign: November Five Zero One Seven November
Runway used: 35
Local Time: 1000
FlightAware: None
